14.1.hd_quote: The recognition that wealth has its own problems.
14.1.behavioral_axis: Anchors prosperity to higher principles before committing fuel.
14.1.shadow_axis: Throws energy/money at problems without discernment.

14.2.hd_quote: The wisdom that investing in expertise brings rewards.
14.2.behavioral_axis: Shares power; invests in competent drivers.
14.2.shadow_axis: Insists on doing everything alone; resists delegation.

14.3.hd_quote: The utilization of talent and wealth for the highest good.
14.3.behavioral_axis: Learns where to place energy by serving and iterating.
14.3.shadow_axis: Hoarding fuel; misplacing resources through naive zeal.

14.4.hd_quote: The concentration on establishing a strong foundation.
14.4.behavioral_axis: Fixes power on one path to build durable security.
14.4.shadow_axis: Overconfident rigidity; easy to exploit blind spots.

14.5.hd_quote: The ever present risk inherent in positions of power.
14.5.behavioral_axis: Holds dignity under projection; minds optics and ethics.

14.6.hd_quote: Wealth and power at its most exalted.
14.6.behavioral_axis: Acknowledges power as given; waits for the right driver.
14.6.shadow_axis: Non-commitment; aloof detachment from practical needs.
